title: Z-Mech

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fire a missile salvo at someone, dealing a Powerful attack to them, Basic attack to their neighbors, and roleblocking people two houses away. You are immune to this, but other Zombies are not. (2 night cooldown)
- Guard someone, granting them Invincible defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the attacker is Astral, you will deal a Powerful counterattack to them.

desc:
Post 3118
*I don't know about you, but I would be terrified if I saw a zombie piloting a mecha suit.*
